entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or snow early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
